Validation of certain charges made by the Sea Fish Industry Authority
	The Sea Fish Industry Authority shall be taken to have had power to makesuch charges as were made by it in the administration of any of the schemesmentioned in subsection (2) or any of those schemes as amended; and the powersof Ministers of the Crown in connection with such schemes shall be construedaccordingly.
	The schemes are—
		the [S.I. 1976/304.] Fishing Vessels (Acquisition and Improvement) (Grants)Scheme 1976,
		the [S.I. 1981/1765.] Fishing Vessels (Acquisition and Improvement)(Grants) Scheme 1981,
		the [S.I. 1987/1135.] Fishing Vessels (Acquisition and Improvement)(Grants) Scheme 1987,
		the [S.I. 1993/1325.] Fishing Vessels (Safety Improvements) (Grants) Scheme1993, and
		the [S.I. 1995/1609.] Fishing Vessels (Safety Improvements) (Grants) Scheme1995.
Validation of certain charges made by the Herring Industry Board
	The Herring Industry Board shall be taken to have had power to make suchcharges as were made by it in the administration of any of the schemesmentioned in subsection (2) or any of those schemes as amended; and the powersof Ministers of the Crown in connection with such schemes shall be construedaccordingly.
	The schemes are—
		the [S.I. 1967/372.] Fishing Vessels (Acquisition and Improvement) (Grants)Scheme 1967, and
		the [S.I. 1976/304.] Fishing Vessels (Acquisition and Improvement) (Grants)Scheme 1976.
Citation, application and extent
	This Act may be cited as the Sea Fishing Grants (Charges) Act 2000.
	This Act does not apply to any charges made after 3rd May 1996.
	This Act extends to Northern Ireland.
